channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.9
item.description:
If you are upgrading from PostgreSQL 18beta1, please dump your databases before installing this upgrade. Servers created with PostgreSQL 18beta2, 18beta3 and 18rc1 are compatible with PostgreSQL 18.

  • PostgreSQL 18.0 with PostGIS 3.6.0

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.
